content:
I have done some change in admin user list page
Before
Screenshot_2020-04-06-home-Zulip-Dev-Zulip.png
After
Screenshot-from-2020-04-06-11-15-48.jpg
Changes
1.Replaced the deactivate and reactivate buttons with icons
2.Added (You) near the current user name to denote his/her account in the entire user list
3.Added crown icon near the admin user name to denote he/she is admin, tooltip admin while hovering the crown icon

  1. Removed Role column since we already denote the admin using the crown icon (point 3)
    5.replaced Role column with Date joined the column
    Any addition or removal? @Tim Abbott @Steve Howell
    open for suggestions
I like the "(You)" idea the best. I think the only thing I'd push back on is removing the Role column, since we can have guest users too, plus we may have other roles soon like "super admin".
ok, I'll restore it @Steve Howell any other changes?
The rest of the changes look good to me, so it's really up to Tim Abbott. I assume it's pretty easy to keep each of those changes as a single commit?
